text: @GovAbbott Abbott... Without a thorough testing of ALL citizens, YOU are doing a GREAT DISSERVICE to everyone. This action will in FACT allow COVID19 to restart and KILL more TEXANS... Every Death after this ORDER will be on YOUR HANDS... GOD HELP US!🦅🇺🇸🦅
